title: TheFlashToken
author: TheFlashToken
content: Introducing $Flash token, inspired by DC Flash movie, on the BNBChain. Our objective is to create a token by the community, for the community. Unlike other tokens, our team has no assigned tokens and will purchase in the presale.With a trading fee of 9%, we have implemented reflection mechanisms such as 3% USDT rewards, 3% liquidity automatically deposited into Pancakeswap burnt, and 3% for marketing and project development.Our team includes experts from the DEFI world, working to bring this innovative idea of combining the hype of a DC movie with the benefits of reflection mechanisms to life.In conclusion, $Flash token aims to bring excitement to the crypto world while benefiting our community through reflection mechanisms and expert development. Join us on this journey to the future!Team no tokens , 100% in lp, LP Locked , 100% Safu LAUNCHED IN PINKSALEhttps://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0xD3d908136094ea727eFEbdfE95d22E65f090f2E7?chain=BSCLINKS Lp lock🏛🔒https://www.bscscan.com/tx/0x7dc3f6d7329c2cdbfe4682410efe59732625f4b7c63b97d5c6b53c9dd9dd9eaeRugdochttps://rugdoc.io/project/the-flash/🔥Pancakeswaphttps://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xCb8bD8082b8C29455a3b6F1E6c3BCA749F3c56e7🏛 Charthttps://dexscreener.com/bsc/0x10418bc28ef8f2314A777eECD348Fc4195Fb56d8https://poocoin.app/tokens/0xcb8bd8082b8c29455a3b6f1e6c3bca749f3c56e7https://www.dexview.com/bsc/0xCb8bD8082b8C29455a3b6F1E6c3BCA749F3c56e7🌐 Webhttps://theflashtoken.xyz💬 ChatTg English📌https://t.me/theflashtokenTg Spanish📌https://t.me/theflashtokenESP 🤩Twitter📌 https://twitter.com/TheFlashToken😝Discordhttps://discord.gg/cbGN564arHMediumhttps://medium.com/@theflashtoken
